title: FS/FT: Mid-Grade T205 Hoblitzell (no "Cin") and Hoblitzel (name incorrect) Variations
author: marcdelpercio

posts.post_title: FS/FT: Mid-Grade T205 Hoblitzell (no "Cin") and Hoblitzel (name incorrect) Variations
posts.post_content:
Hello,
I have the following T205 Richard Hoblitzell variations available for sale or trade.  Both are considered tougher short prints in the set and are difficult to find in decent condition:

Hoblitzel (name incorrect) Sweet Caporal Fac. 42 - card is miscut top/bottom and has a slight diamond cut.  Double border showing on the top back.  Light edge and corner wear.  I would grade this as VG/EX.  Price $150 delivered.

Hoblitzell (name correct, no "Cin") Piedmont Fac. 25 - light paper scuffing near top border on back and a black print mark on the top front border.  I would grade this at G/VG.  Price $125 delivered.


Take both for $250 delivered.  I would also consider trades for any similarly valued tobacco or caramel cards I need from any sets I'm working on.

I accept payment via any method you prefer.  Please send me a PM or e-mail to [url]marcdelpercio2000@yahoo.com[/url] with any questions, trade offers, or to purchase a card.  Thanks for looking!
